title: Login Error
body:
After being forced to disconnect from the servers, I can no longer relog on any of my accounts. Friends have also had this issue but others are still online just fine. What's going on??

Edit: I'VE FOUND OUT THERE'S OTHERS WHO HAVE COMCAST AND ARE HAVING THIS ISSUE. SO FAR EVERYONE WHO CRASHED AND CAN'T REJOIN HAVE COMCAST.

replies.body: Hmmmmmm hopefully Comcast isn't having any major issues, but let's run a quick traceroute to see what's going on after your connection leaves your network. Use a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1. Paste what it gives you back here so I can look over it with the techies and figure out what's wrong!
